scripts.build:prod: rimraf rgresult && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod parcel build --out-dir rgresult --public-url ../rgresult index.html
scripts.build:test: rimraf rgresult && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev parcel build --out-dir rgresult --public-url ../rgresult index.html
scripts.build:pre: rimraf rgresult && cross-env NODE_ENV=pre parcel build --out-dir rgresult --public-url ../rgresult index.html
